title: Good Luck!
description: People from around the world believe various objects and traditions bring good luck. Good Luck! provides students a look at some of these good luck items. Detailed photographs and high-frequency words support emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of simple subjects.
reviewWords: believe, bring, ideas, items, lantern, luck
comprehension: Author's Purpose                : Determine the author's purpose for writing
awareness: Consonant Digraph Sounds                : Discriminate consonant digraph /ck/ sound
grammar: Proper Nouns                : Recognize and use nouns
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word think
